# ----------- Global Definitions -----------
SET(LIBRARY_NAME ImGui-Backend)

# ------------- Library Setup --------------
SET(PRIVATE_MODULES_BASE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/Private)
SET(PUBLIC_MODULES_BASE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/Public)

SET(PRIVATE_MODULES
        ${PRIVATE_MODULES_BASE_DIRECTORY}/imgui_impl_vulkan.cpp
        ${PRIVATE_MODULES_BASE_DIRECTORY}/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
)

SET(PUBLIC_MODULES
        ${PUBLIC_MODULES_BASE_DIRECTORY}/imgui_impl_vulkan.h
        ${PUBLIC_MODULES_BASE_DIRECTORY}/imgui_impl_glfw.h
)

ADD_LIBRARY(${LIBRARY_NAME} ${PRIVATE_MODULES})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${LIBRARY_NAME} PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${LIBRARY_NAME} PUBLIC ${PUBLIC_MODULES_BASE_DIRECTORY})

FIND_PACKAGE(glfw3 CONFIG REQUIRED)
FIND_PACKAGE(imgui CONFIG REQUIRED)
FIND_PACKAGE(volk CONFIG REQUIRED)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${LIBRARY_NAME} PRIVATE
        glfw
        imgui::imgui
        volk::volk_headers
)

TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS(${LIBRARY_NAME} PUBLIC
        VK_NO_PROTOTYPES
        IMGUI_IMPL_VULKAN_NO_PROTOTYPES
)
